about_the_game:
Shenmue III - Big Merry Cruise

A new cruise ship has arrived in the Niaowu harbor.

Various types of entertainment can be enjoyed aboard the ship, as well as challenge missions which can only be played here. Also, new outfits for Ryo can be obtained by clearing mini-quests encountered onboard.

*You must have reached Niaowu or have save data on which the game has been cleared to play.
